website_summaries.verdict: Affordable and portable bistro set that is versatile for spaces and decor of all sizes. Great for camping, tailgating, balconies, and poolside seating.
pros: Easy to pack up, and bright colors so they look stylish and modern
While small, they are sturdy enough to accommodate body weight over 200 pounds
Cleaning is easy thanks to powder coating, so it’s simple to wipe down and maintain
cons: Frame is metal so some consumers stated it heats up in the summertime and they had to buy cushions to protect their legs from burning

customer_reviews.title: Durable outdoors and makes for nice corner table in our room now
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our outside patio, and it withstood the weather great. It wipes down very easily. It still looks like new despite having been outside for almost a year, and the paint still looks clean and fresh. We moved the table and 1 chair into our bedroom to have a corner where we can get away when we have too many Zoom calls going on the living room and it's a nice addition. It makes our bedroom feel like a hotel room. The chairs aren't terribly comfortable if you're sitting for more than an hour, so that's why I gave 4 instead of 5 stars. Otherwise, definitely a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Indie Film Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but beware of rust!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute patio set and it came exactly as pictured. It’s easy to set up and is the perfect size for a small patio. However, as another review already stated, it rusts very easily. I’ve only had this set for one week and it is already starting to rust on the seat after 2 days in the rain. It’s a bit disappointing, but I do like the set and plan on keeping it and just trying to keep anymore rust from forming.
customer_reviews.author: Hops

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable set.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bistro set. Exactly what we wanted. Folds away really easily for storage. I would just say their description of Blue is not accurate. It’s as pictured a turquoise / Miami green/blue. Really bright fun colour for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. J. Coupe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for a small deck!
customer_reviews.text: So happy this arrived sooner that expected. Love the turquoise color. Set arrived well packed. Best part is I can use in the summer/fall and then fold up and put away for next year. Chairs are not the most comfortable so I might get cushions. I really like the set!
customer_reviews.author: skinnychic8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my porch
customer_reviews.text: This little table set came already assembled. It was as simple as pulling it out of the box and unfolding it. It is sturdy, super cute, and makes the perfect addition to my porch.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Warren

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little patio set. The pale blue is beautiful. Looks like something out of a European setting! Perfect for small spaces. Each piece folds so moving is so easy. Bought the second one for myself. Well made and finished. Comes ready to unfold and use. Thank YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this company and their products
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for a friend and she absolutely loves it~ it arrived 11 days earlier than expected and it looks beautiful on her patio~ I highly recommend this company ~ they responded to my email in less than 15 minutes regarding delivery~ 5*
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bettencourt Brymer

customer_reviews.title: Problem with delivered product, but supplier made good!
customer_reviews.text: The set was beautiful, but one of the pads on a chair was missing. Contacted Orange-Casual and they immediately sent replacement pads. Couldn’t have asked for a better response from the Company. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Tregurtha

customer_reviews.title: Evident Rust
customer_reviews.text: My patio set has been on my front porch for 6 days, and it is already showing rust on one of the chairs (assuming there is uncoated metal along a section near fold). Not sure what to do. Don’t have the energy to send it back...can I coat it with a varnish?
customer_reviews.author: A. Beatty

customer_reviews.title: beautiful bistro set
customer_reviews.text: beautiful bistro set. arrived in perfect condition. just the color I was looking for. As pictured.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service! :)
customer_reviews.text: I love our table and chairs. When delivered the table had to small dents. I contacted seller and they were fantastic! Sent me a new table! Wow! At no charge! They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: blue = turquoise
customer_reviews.text: love this set! I ordered the 'blue' because a reviewer said the color was turquoise and that was the color I was looking for....it's perfect for our very small front porch at our beach house!
customer_reviews.author: RJS18

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed but slightly rusts
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, seats were more comfortable than expected. The size is perfect for our tiny space. There was slight rusting at the metal joints after one evening outside with no rain. After the first rain the rust did increase. But hopefully a little white spray paint will fix that. If OC wants to send us some that would be amazing 😉
customer_reviews.author: Penelope A. Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Was surprisingly nice for the money. Color was great.Arived in great time
customer_reviews.author: Jill Fesnick

customer_reviews.title: Really glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: The tiffany blue is gorgeous & the chairs are pretty comfortable too. Really happy w/ this find to update an old bistro set. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: A.Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: This set is exactly what I wanted. Color is lovely and it fits perfectly on my patio. Customer service was excellent when I had an issue. They resolved it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little set
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in turquoise blue. It's so cute! Surprisingly sturdy, easily folds up for storage. Glad we found this set, love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Already assembled!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit for a small apartment balcony, and can be folded and put away if a storm is coming!
customer_reviews.author: SLI

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy bistro set!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable bistro set for camping, this is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: We really like these little tables and chairs for our front porch. They are sturdy, but not too heavy to take in every evening. They are comfortable and a good size.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Graves

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my patio set. Sooo cute and simple. The color is very pretty. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hart

customer_reviews.title: Added my touch of Paris to my Isolation days!
customer_reviews.text: This set was just what I was looking for. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Doris K Lees

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size / Cheerful Color
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my balcony and a beautiful, cheerful color.
customer_reviews.author: rachel main

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about this set. It is very cute, the color is wonderful and it is extremely well made. Couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Greenhouse

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: heavy set, which shows how solid and durable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Paulino Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. People that walk by says that it’s so cute and they love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Ev

customer_reviews.title: Great item, seller came through on product
customer_reviews.text: The seller made good on original product review. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and easy to move/put away. Showing a little rust after getting rained on though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Bistro set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bistro set, I live in a small apartment and it fits the space and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: tami hayes

product_meta.title: OC Orange-Casual Premium Steel Patio Bistro Set, Folding Outdoor Furniture Sets, 3 Piece Set of Foldable Chairs and Table, Turquoise
feature_bullets: Premium Style-Modern design, wide and thick bars on the seat panel and back make it comfortable and strong. Plastic pieces on the each foot, keep your floor from scratching.
Powder coated steel frame structure, rust-resistant. Perfect for backyard, porch, poolside, balcony. Each piece of the set is foldable, allowing for easy storage during off-season.
Heavy-duty construction yet light weight chairs can hold up to 220lbs respectively.
Maintenance free, with smooth surface procession is easy to clean.
Chair size: 16(W) X17(D) X32(H) Inches; Table size: 24(DIA) X28(H) Inches.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
